title: Monospace font - NYLON Magazine
author: daviidavo

comments.content:
It must be **[Atlas Typewriter (Regular)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172159/http:/commercialtype.com/typefaces/atlas/typewriter)** by Commercial Type  
 [http://commercialtype.com/typefaces/atlas/typewriter](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172159/http:/commercialtype.com/typefaces/atlas/typewriter "http://commercialtype.com/typefaces/atlas/typewriter")
You genius! Yes, it is! Thank you so much!! Can't believe I got it here in like 2 minutes. Always wondered what it was!

You are welcome David, I'm glad I helped you.  
There are indeed many font-geniuses in Typophile, but to be honest I'm not one of them (I just used some piece of software to identify your font).  
Fivos
